name: Moto Bike Trail Master
description:
Moto Bike Trail Master is an addictive game play in which you have an opportunity to do dirt bike stunts. Demonstrate your aptitude and become a motorcycle stunting master. We bring a unique bike racing 3d game for you which will give a real fun to do top stunts. The free racing bike game has multiple challenging levels and a great variety of different new motorcycles to do bang stunts. But to become a best bike rider you have to show your motocross madness fun game.

Features:
- Real bike stunting animations
- Enhanced camera view to enjoy racing
- Crazy obstacles and cool power-ups
- The most amazing bike physics
- Extremely speedy racing action
- Coolest collection of fast paced heavy bikes
- Fun guaranteed
- Simple and easy controls
